subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: The skipper Mark Mendelblatt and the crew Bruno Prada finished first in Day 3 of sailing at the Bacardi Cup Star Class Regatta on Biscayne Bay off Miami. Mendelblatt, the 2005 Bacardi Cup champion, and Prada, a Brazilian, moved up six slots to third over all in the six-race event. Peter Bromby and his crew, Magnus Liljedahl, remained the overall leaders. bacardiCup.
